websites.description: Realtime MERN chat app with Socket.io, JWT authentication, Cloudinary uploads, and Zustand state management. Users can send messages, share media, view online status, and enjoy a clean, responsive interface.
Real Estate MERN app where users can discover, search, and list properties for rent or sale. Users create and manage listings, view detailed info, and log in with a clean user interface.
E-commerce MERN app with full cart, product search, and PayPal checkout. Users can browse items, add to cart, leave reviews, and manage orders through a modern, responsive interface.
Practice MERN app where users can register, add places with descriptions, and view details. Built to strengthen fullstack skills with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js in a simple interface.
React food store app where users can browse meals, add to cart, and place orders. Features account login, quantity control, and responsive design for a smooth shopping experience.
React clothes store where users can browse products, view details, and add to cart. Includes account login, quantity adjustment, and responsive design for a seamless shopping experience.
React task manager where users can add, edit, and delete tasks with deadlines. Features completion tracking, daily task view, and Redux Toolkit for efficient state management.
Music search app that lets users find songs, view artist info, and see prices. Built with React.js to deliver a clean, responsive, and interactive listening discovery experience.
Cocktail recipe app where users can browse drinks, search by name, and view details. Designed with responsive layouts for easy access on mobile and desktop devices alike.
websites.siteName: Tales of Cocktails with Redux Toolkit

websites.description: Simple JavaScript joke app where users click a button to hear jokes via text-to-speech. Optimized for mobile devices with a minimal and engaging design.
Static travel site showcasing tours, customer stories, and contact info. Built with HTML, CSS, and JS for a fully responsive design with smooth, engaging animations.
